description.oldValue:
Handoff is a capability within Apple devices that transfers user activities among multiple devices associated with the same user. For Outlook, this means that introducing this feature will allow a user to start off on an activity like read or compose within Outlook on one Apple device (Mobile/Mac) and be able to continue that activity from its current point on Outlook on another Apple device (Mobile/Mac).
GA date: August CY2022
description.newValue: Handoff is a capability within Apple devices that transfers user activities among multiple devices associated with the same user. For Outlook, this means that introducing this feature will allow a user to start off on an activity like read or compose within Outlook on one Apple device (Mobile/Mac) and be able to continue that activity from its current point on Outlook on another Apple device (Mobile/Mac).
